body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play a deck with both Mistbind Clique and Bitterblossom.
2. Cast Mistbind Clique while Bitterblossom is on the battlefield. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Bitterblossom ought to be a valid target for the champion trigger. It is not. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.22
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Mistbind Clique (and other champion creatures?) won't champion tribal permanents

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision a14690b8cd67 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Thanks for spotting this bug.

Mistbind Clique was only able to exile faerie CREATURES. I fixed that.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/) on February 05, 2012 01:49:40_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play a deck with both Mistbind Clique and Bitterblossom.
2. Cast Mistbind Clique while Bitterblossom is on the battlefield. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Bitterblossom ought to be a valid target for the champion trigger. It is not. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.22

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=153_
